author: Lucien Bruggeman
title: Trump's sons distance themselves from new Trump-branded crypto venture
description: A crypto company has launched what it's calling the "Official $TRUMP Wallet" -- but the president's sons, who run Trump's crypto businesses, say they have no involvement.
content: A digital asset company has collaborated with the firm behind President Donald Trump's $TRUMP meme coin to launch what it's calling the "Official $TRUMP Wallet" -- but the president's sons, who run T… [+2770 chars]
